# File lib/json/pure/parser.rb, line 54
54:       def initialize(source, opts = {})
55:         super
56:         if !opts.key?(:max_nesting) # defaults to 19
57:           @max_nesting = 19
58:         elsif opts[:max_nesting]
59:           @max_nesting = opts[:max_nesting]
60:         else
61:           @max_nesting = 0
62:         end
63:         @create_id = JSON.create_id
64:       end
